Scene:
Kōjō [announcement/special performance]
(Kōjō / 口上)

Play: Announcement on the change of puppeteer Monya Kiritake's name to Tamamatsu Yoshida III (口上(桐竹紋弥改め三世吉田玉松襲名披露))

Production: February 1973

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Tsudayū IV (竹本津大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Kanji VI (鶴澤寛治 (六))



Performers:

Puppeteer Character Kashira
